attributes.action: Deploy London's crowd control water cannons at Calais.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.rt.com/uk/239797-boris-may-water-cannons/

We own them, let's use them!
attributes.background: Migrants keep trying to storm the euro tunnel to gain illegal access to England. The water cannons that London purchased have been denied for use agains British citizens, however this would be perfectly acceptable to protect the euro tunnel trains. The bonus is the trains can get washed.

rejection.details: Law and order in and around Calais is the responsibility of the French authorities.
